item.description: It's a mystical, foggy evening, the anniversary of a 1925 train wreck...and you're traveling aboard The Fright Train...will the ghosts from this terrible tragedy appear? As the legend goes...David, a working-class waiter in Fenwick, is traveling aboard the Connecticut Valley Line to visit his secret love Dahlia, the daughter of a wealthy family. In his hand, an engagement ring with which to propose marriage. But, another train is approaching. Zeke, the reliable Deep River switchman suffers a massive heart attack and never pulls the switch. The trains CRASH! http://essexsteamtrain.com/frighttrain.html 6:00 PM meet for the 6:30 PM ride. Advance tickets recommended - - -

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Riders Beware: Ghosts of a Train Crash on a Halloween Haunt!
